                           Release Notes

Comments :
A thriller about an IRA gunman who draws an American family into the 
crossfire of terrorism. Frankie McGuire is one of the IRA&#039;s deadliest 
assassins. But when he is sent to the U.S. to buy weapons, Frankie is 
housed with the family of Tom O&#039;Meara, a New York cop who knows nothing 
about Frankie&#039;s real identity. Their surprising friendship, and Tom&#039;s 
growing suspicions, force Frankie to choose between the promise of peace 
or a lifetime of murder.

Director : Alan J. Pakula

Writers: Kevin Jarre (story)
         David Aaron Cohen (screenplay)
